pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Lucky Charm Hotel Lucky Charm Home Facilities Advantages Events Casino Be in touch Privacy Policy Lucky Charm is a sanctuary where you can escape from the world and immerse yourself in a realm of luxury, excitement, and entertainment. Our hotel-casino complex is a masterpiece of modern architecture, blending seamlessly with the natural beauty of our surroundings. We offer a wide range of amenities and services to ensure that your stay with us is nothing short of spectacular. Our hotel is a haven of comfort and elegance, with spacious and beautifully appointed rooms and suites that offer stunning views of the surroundings. Each room is equipped with state-of-the-art amenities to ensure that you have everything you need for a relaxing and enjoyable stay. Our friendly and attentive staff is always on hand to assist you with anything you may need. Lucky Charm's casino is a world-class gaming destination, offering a wide variety of popular games and slot machines. Whether you're a seasoned pro or a newcomer to the world of gaming, we have something for everyone. Our casino is designed to provide an exciting and enjoyable experience for all of our guests. We are committed to responsible gaming and have a number of measures in place to ensure that our guests can enjoy their time in the casino in a safe and secure environment. In addition to our hotel and casino, Lucky Charm also offers a wide range of dining and entertainment options. Our restaurants and bars serve up delicious cuisine and refreshing drinks, while our live shows and events provide hours of fun and excitement. We also have a state-of-the-art fitness center and a luxurious spa, where you can relax and rejuvenate your body and mind. At Lucky Charm, we are committed to protecting the privacy and security of our guests. This Privacy Policy page explains the types of information we may collect from you when you visit our site, how we use and disclose that information, and how you can access and modify the information we hold about you. We understand that privacy is a major concern for many of our guests. That's why we have taken a number of steps to ensure that your personal information is kept safe and secure. We use a variety of physical, electronic, and procedural safeguards to protect your information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. It's important to note that while this Privacy Policy page applies to the Lucky Charm site, it does not apply to any third-party sites that may be linked to our site. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or the content of these third-party sites. We recommend that you carefully review the privacy policies of any third-party sites that you visit. We hope that this Privacy Policy page has provided you with a clear and concise overview of our practices regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of information. If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or about the way in which we handle your personal information, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are always here to help. At Lucky Charm, we are committed to providing our guests with a personalized and seamless experience. That's why we have invested in cutting-edge technology and innovative systems to ensure that everything runs smoothly and efficiently. Our hotel-casino complex is equipped with a state-of-the-art security system, including 24-hour surveillance cameras and highly trained security personnel. We have a zero-tolerance policy for any criminal or disruptive behavior, and we work closely with local law enforcement to ensure the safety and security of our guests. We also have a comprehensive emergency response plan in place, including procedures for natural disasters, medical emergencies, and other unexpected events. Our staff is fully trained in these procedures and is ready to respond to any situation at a moment's notice. In addition to our security and emergency response measures, we also have a number of other systems and technologies in place to enhance the guest experience. For example, our hotel rooms are equipped with smart thermostats and lighting systems, allowing guests to customize the environment to their liking. Our casino is also equipped with the latest gaming technology, including electronic table games and slot machines with advanced graphics and sound effects. We offer a wide range of popular games, including blackjack, roulette, craps, and poker, as well as a variety of slot machines with different themes and jackpots. For guests who prefer a more relaxed and low-key gaming experience, we also offer a number of alternative options. Our sports book allows guests to bet on a variety of sporting events, while our race and sports simulcast center allows guests to watch and wager on live horse and greyhound races from around the country. Thank you for choosing Lucky Charm as your hotel-casino destination. We look forward to welcoming you to our little slice of paradise and providing you with an unforgettable experience. For any further inquiries, please feel free to reach us at luckycharm@gmail.com. pages.terms-conditions: Terms of Use - Lucky Charm Hotel Lucky Charm Home Facilities Advantages Events Casino Be in touch Terms of Use Our Website: Lucky Charm's website is a digital extension of our hotel-casino, designed to provide you with essential information about our services, amenities, and promotions. We strive to ensure that the content on our website is accurate, up-to-date, and helpful. However, we cannot guarantee that the information is error-free or that it will be suitable for your specific needs. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any aspect of our website at any time, without notice or liability to you. We also reserve the right to restrict access to our website or specific parts of it, at our discretion. Your Use of Our Website: You agree to use our website for lawful purposes only and in a manner that does not infringe the rights of, or restrict or inhibit the use and enjoyment of, our website by any third party. You are responsible for ensuring that your use of our website complies with these terms and all applicable laws and regulations. You may not use our website to transmit, distribute, store, or destroy material, including, but not limited to, the following: (a) material that is unlawful, harmful, threatening, defamatory, obscene, infringing, harassing, or racially or ethnically offensive; (b) material that facilitates illegal activity; (c) material that depicts sexually explicit images; (d) material that promotes unlawful violence; (e) material that is discriminatory based on race, gender, color, religious belief, sexual orientation, disability, or any other illegal basis; or (f) material that is otherwise illegal or causes damage or injury to any person or property. Intellectual Property: All content on our website, including, but not limited to, text, images, graphics, logos, audio clips, video clips, and software, is the property of Lucky Charm or its content suppliers and is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws. You may not modify, copy, reproduce, republish, upload, post, transmit, or distribute, in any manner, the material on our website, including text, graphics, code, and/or software without our prior written consent. Links to Third-Party Websites: Our website may contain links to third-party websites that are not owned or controlled by Lucky Charm. We have no control over, and assume no responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party websites. We encourage you to review the terms of use and privacy policies of any third-party websites you visit. Disclaimer of Warranties: Our website and its content are provided "as is" and "as available," without any warranties of any kind, either express or implied. Lucky Charm disclaims all warranties, including, but not limited to, any implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, title, and non-infringement. Limitation of Liability: In no event shall Lucky Charm, its affiliates, or their respective directors, officers, employees, or agents be liable for any damages whatsoever, including, but not limited to, direct, indirect, special, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages, arising out of or in connection with the use of, or inability to use, our website or its content. Governing Law: These terms of use shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the state in which Lucky Charm is located, without giving effect to any principles of conflicts of law. You agree to submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of that state for any disputes arising out of or in connection with these terms or your use of our website. Changes to These Terms: Lucky Charm reserves the right to modify these terms of use at any time, without notice or liability to you. The most current version of these terms will be posted on our website, and your continued use of our website after any changes to these terms will constitute your acceptance of the revised terms. Promotions and Offers: Lucky Charm may occasionally offer promotions, contests, or sweepstakes on our website. Any such offers will be subject to their own terms and conditions, which will be posted on our website. By participating in any promotion, contest, or sweepstakes, you agree to be bound by the applicable terms and conditions. Reservations and Cancellations: You may use our website to make reservations for our hotel, casino, or other amenities. All reservations are subject to availability and must be guaranteed with a valid credit card. We reserve the right to cancel any reservation that is not guaranteed with a valid credit card. You may cancel or modify your reservation up to 24 hours before your scheduled arrival time, without penalty. If you cancel or modify your reservation less than 24 hours before your scheduled arrival time, or if you fail to arrive for your reservation, we will charge your credit card for one night's room and tax, plus any applicable cancellation or modification fees. Contact Us: If you have any questions or concerns about these terms of use or our website, please feel free to contact us at luckycharm@gmail.com. pages.disclaimer: Disclaimer - Lucky Charm Hotel Lucky Charm Home Facilities Advantages Events Casino Be in touch Disclaimer Welcome to Lucky Charm, an unparalleled hotel-casino experience that blends luxury, entertainment, and relaxation in a stunning setting. We are delighted to have you as our guest and are committed to making your stay with us memorable and enjoyable. As a responsible establishment, we believe in transparency and fairness in all our dealings. This Disclaimer page is designed to provide you with essential information about the nature of our services and the rules that govern them. Please take a few moments to read through this page carefully, as it contains important information that may affect your rights and obligations. First and foremost, Lucky Charm is a hotel-casino establishment that offers a wide range of services and amenities to our guests. These include, but are not limited to, luxurious accommodation, fine dining, spa and wellness facilities, and a state-of-the-art casino featuring a variety of games and machines. Our casino is a place for adults to enjoy gaming and entertainment in a safe, secure, and regulated environment. It is important to note that all gaming and gambling activities at Lucky Charm are subject to the laws and regulations of the jurisdiction in which we operate. We do not condone or facilitate any form of illegal gambling, and we reserve the right to refuse service to anyone who is found to be in violation of these laws and regulations. Gambling can be an exciting and entertaining pastime, but it is important to remember that it also involves a certain degree of risk. The outcome of all games and machines at Lucky Charm is determined by chance, and there is no guarantee of winning. We encourage all our guests to gamble responsibly and to set limits on the time and money they spend on gaming activities. In order to maintain a safe and enjoyable environment for all our guests, we have established certain rules and policies that must be adhered to. These include, but are not limited to, a dress code, a code of conduct, and rules regarding the use of our facilities and services. We reserve the right to amend or modify these rules and policies at any time, and we encourage our guests to familiarize themselves with them before and during their stay. While we strive to provide our guests with the highest level of service and satisfaction, we cannot be held responsible for any losses, damages, or injuries that may occur as a result of their actions or decisions. This includes, but is not limited to, losses incurred from gambling, damages to property, and personal injuries. It is also important to note that Lucky Charm is not responsible for the content, accuracy, or reliability of any third-party websites or services that may be linked to or from our site. We do not endorse or approve of any such third-party sites or services, and we encourage our guests to exercise caution and discretion when using them. At Lucky Charm, we are committed to providing our guests with a wide range of entertainment options to suit every taste and preference. Our state-of-the-art casino is the jewel in our crown, featuring a dazzling array of games and machines that are sure to thrill and delight. Whether you are a seasoned gambler or a newcomer to the world of gaming, you will find something to suit your style and skill level at Lucky Charm. Our casino floor is home to all the classic casino games, including blackjack, roulette, craps, and baccarat. We also offer a variety of poker games, including Texas Hold'em, Omaha, and Seven-Card Stud. For those who prefer the excitement of the spinning reels, we have a vast selection of slot machines to choose from, including traditional three-reel slots, video slots, and progressive jackpot slots. Our slots are available in a range of denominations to suit every budget, from penny slots to high-limit machines. In addition to our casino, we also offer a variety of other entertainment options to ensure that our guests are never bored. Our luxurious hotel features a range of amenities and facilities, including a spa and wellness center, a fitness center, and an outdoor swimming pool. We also have several restaurants and bars on-site, serving everything from fine dining to casual fare. Our chefs are renowned for their culinary skills and creativity, and they use only the freshest and finest ingredients to create dishes that are truly unforgettable. In conclusion, we would like to thank you for choosing Lucky Charm as your hotel-casino destination, and we hope that this Disclaimer page has provided you with a clear and concise understanding of our services and policies. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us at luckycharm@gmail.com. We are always here to assist you and to make your stay with us as enjoyable and memorable as possible. Discover the enchantment of Lucky Charm, where every moment is a chance to win, and every experience is a treasure to cherish. We look forward to welcoming you to our magical world of luxury, entertainment, and relaxation.
